articles.title: Aussie cult hero causes stir in Albo photo
articles.description: Teen cricket sensation Sam Konstas has been slammed online for sticking out like a sore thumb as the Australian side posed for its traditional snap with Prime Minister Anthony Albanese ahead of the fifth Test against India.
